data.system_settings: iPhone 6 iOS 10.3.2 Dev Beta 2, latest Discord Testflight
data.actual_result: A box surrounding both mentions displayed
data.expected_result: Both mentions will display its own box when clicking on either mention
data.short_description: Mentioning the same user two times in one message without a space between the mentions then clicking it will think its one mention
data.steps_to_repro: - Mention the user two times in a message without a space between them (eg. <@116693403147698181><@116693403147698181>) - Click on the mention
